name: Documentation Tag & Status Bar
description:
Streamline your design documentation, help others understand versioning, and keep track of design work status with two easy to use components! 


To use: 

  1. copy this file into your project (so you have all the building blocks); 
  2. grab an instance of the Tag and Status Bar; 
  3. add to your canvas above your designs!


*Updates:

The Tag component now supports a Tall variant that can be used alongside long design documentation. This version can also be made very narrow, which is helpful for smaller screen sizes.


History:
1.0 - initial publication (5/10/21)
1.5 - minor autolayout fixes (5/10/21)
2.0 - Tall Tag Variant release (5/11/21)
